DESCRIPTION: Set a custom prefix on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setprefix** ~ Resets the prefix on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}setprefix [New Prefix]** ~ Sets the new prefix for your server.
ALIASES: Setprefix does not have any aliases.
UPDATED: The prefix for this server has been updated.
RESET: The prefix for this server has been reset.
